tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am jawahar from trichy..its my first appointment with Dr. E.Sathish kumar....I met him for EF problem in my heart. He is kind hearted , knowlegable and he answered very patiently to all my questions ...I felt his professionalism in each and every words he shared with us....

We had met the doctor and it was for my father for cardiology related issue, we went for second opinion. ****** *** ***** he told to bypass surgery for my father. Medicines was not prescribed. Waiting time was 30 - 60 minutes . I am satisfied with the treatment given. Surgery was not done later. My father is fine now. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Hospitality was good.
